feed.title: North Mountain (Cape Breton) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: LES SUÃŠTES WIND WARNING , North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -9.8°C
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to ice pellets or freezing rain in the afternoon then to rain late in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 110 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
